title: Looking for an artist
body: well im a champ designer, I need a dozen artists and concept art, for my skins and champ designs anyone here?

replies.body:
1) you would need to pay them. it takes a lot of dedication for an artist to do something also quite a bit of creative energy.
2) I notice you don't have a Riot tag on your name so please don't call yourself a "champion designer" because really I think it's not an accurate title.

> [{quoted}](name=Crusader charlie,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=TGARLzMn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-09T22:52:10.679+0000)
>
> 1) you would need to pay them. it takes a lot of dedication for an artist to do something also quite a bit of creative energy.
> 2) I notice you don't have a Riot tag on your name so please don't call yourself a "champion designer" because really I think it's not an accurate title.

He probably makes fan made ones.
Player Creations fourm means that it's player creation hence why I can call myself a champ designer here for players, duh simple logic
